DOC.brief_summary: Panic Disorder without agoraphobia ( PD/A ) common , unless treat , often chronic psychiatric disorder . The effective pharmacological well psychological treatment PD/A . Because lack availability effective psychological treatment , cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) , self-help base CBT treatment develop . One Internet-based CBT . The aim study compare effectiveness Internet group CBT PD/A regular psychiatric setting . 113 patient consecutively randomly assign either treatment ( last 10 week ) . The main outcome measure Panic Disorder Severity Scale ( PDSS ) . The study hypothesis treatment show equal effectiveness .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Versus Group-Administered Cognitive Behavior Therapy Panic Disorder
